title: Smartphone users in Canada 2013 to 2023
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Smartphone users in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Smartphone users in millions has rose over the Year.
Smartphone users in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Smartphone users in millions, of value 30.4 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest Smartphone users in millions, of value 15.2 was reported at Year 2013
